subject: Order #SSN2162
description_text:
ï»¿hi there,

I recently ordered 2 packs of elastomers from your website, however I was sent 2 springs instead, this is not what I ordered. Is there a way I can have the correct goods sent to me? 

Please find attached below the image of my parcel as I received it, being 2 springs with the shipping label

I look forward to hearing back
Kind regards
Liam

conversations.body_text: Hi Liam Swinburn,    We apologize for the mistake made by our warehouse staff. We will resend your order immediately. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hi, 

Thank you very much, could I please get an update when available with regards to this. And possibly a shipping number.

Thank you so much
Liam 


>
Hi Liam Swinburn,    We have reshipped it for you. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045859789431
